extendedInfo.description: Stock Android Grass live wallpaper ported to ICS.I have ported it for my own needs.Known bugs:night mode on Galaxy Nexus and Galaxy S3 and probably on any other devices with similar screen resolution. github repository: https://github.com/chertykov/Grass-ICS

reviews.title: Fix the flickering!
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this after loving it on my android, it\'s a beautiful wallpaper but like everyone else I\'m seeing flickering on the right side of the screen during night mode. Fix this and it\'s five stars all the way.
reviews.author: Patrick Daye

reviews.title: Fix for Night Mode
reviews.comment: I am giving this a four star because everything on this app works works incredibly well on the Transformer Prime. I also have the Galaxy Nexus running Jelly Bean and the night mode does not work. Please fix this issue so I can enjoy the mode on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: For me this is the best live wallpaper since i\'m using my Xperia. When I upgraded to ICS, I lost this wallpaper, although the icon of live wallpaper was still showing this wallpaper. And now I find it on play store, Thanks to manufacturer.
reviews.author: Sanket Kumar

reviews.title: just merge code and re-up
reviews.comment: The fixes in the source code allow this wallpaper to work on any resolution... I know because I straight-compiled an apk file and loaded it onto both my Galaxy Nexus and my Nexus 7, and it works perfectly! Now just do it on your end for all of us to enjoy (:
reviews.author: Doncarlo Agustino

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had any issues with it but I\'d like if I could set to have more grass showing. My icons on the bottom cover up all the grass. Actually that might be because of the problems everyone with an S III is having.
reviews.author: Amy Kloud

reviews.title: My favorite live wallpaper on ICS
reviews.comment: Don\'t know how you did it, but this is great! 5 stars. I don\'t care if it drains the battery that\'s my choice Google.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mmmm just to lazy
reviews.comment: He is too lazy to update the app his github has the fix for HD phones but he hasn\'t updated the app I downloaded his github and built the app myself and it works on my rezound
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Phone upgraded no grass works ok motorola xt910
reviews.author: Toni Sherlock

reviews.title: Had to uninstall it.
reviews.comment: I have an HTC and the night time hasn\'t been working. Are you ever going to fix this??? Other wise I love this wallpaper!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: David
reviews.comment: What\'s up with the adds? Sorry, wrong wallpaper. Reinstall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be my favorite
reviews.comment: Please fix the bug for the Samsung! I hate the split screen! This has been going on long enough that a solution should have been made months ago!
reviews.author: Nancy DeLazzaro Brannum

reviews.title: Clean and Intuitive
reviews.comment: Its not busy, or boring. I instantly get an idea of what time it is without reading the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitches at night
reviews.comment: It looks cool and simple in the day grass but it glitches at night. It\'s weird.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7 issue
reviews.comment: Does not work on my nexus 7. Have it on my HTC amaze and love it. Would love to have it on my tablet too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks bad
reviews.comment: Really wanted this back on JB.but this doesn\'t look nice on Samsung note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very Upset With This LWP... It Brings Back Memories Of Holidays... But The Evening Mode Goes Weird,A Strip By The Grass Is In Evening And The Rest Is In Night Mode... Morning Mode Is Fine, Night Mode Has Problems Too,Same Issue With The Evening, Strip Of A Light Colour...Please PLEASE Make An Update,I\'ll Be The Happiest Girl Alive! Xperia T
reviews.author: Antonia Ayers

reviews.title: Was awesome on Transformer Infinity
reviews.comment: This was a stock wallpaper on my Transformer TF700 with ICS; I would have given it 6 out of 5 stars. I absolutely loved it, even showed it off at different times of the day.  When I upgraded to Jellybean, it was missing and was the first thing I installed.  Works great during the day, but at night, no fireflies, and the bottom 15% of the screen is flickering red and yellow grass.  Keep up the good work, and I look forward to any fixes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Night mode not working on padfone2
reviews.comment: Good wallpaper but too bad not working on padfone2 JB
reviews.author: iiee ann

reviews.title: Not very good
reviews.comment: The left hand side is fine but the right hand side has a long white line
reviews.author: Rhyann Onoro

reviews.title: Fix Night Please
reviews.comment: Would be wonderful if the night portion worked. Please fix that.
reviews.author: Laurie Nix
